edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.scene
Class TangibleView

java.lang.Object
  Node
      edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.scene.TangibleView
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrainRegionView, CurveAnchorPointView, CurveView, NeuronMorphologyView, SegmentView
public abstract class TangibleView
extends Node

A base class for the view classes that display Tangibles. Need to implement right-click bringing up a context menu for each TangibleView

Author:
Stephen D. Larson (slarson@ncmir.ucsd.edu)
